    How AI Shapes Me ‚Äî My Evolving Attitude Toward Artificial Intelligence

    On this page

    • My Life Inside the AI Era
    • How AI Shapes My daily life
    • My Attitude Toward AI
    • Different ways of using AI
    • When to trust AI
    • When NOT to trust AI
    • Future Outlook ‚Äî What‚Äôs Next?

    My Life Inside the AI Era

    We are living in an explosive AI era. Without a doubt, AI is reshaping everything around us ‚Äî how we learn, work, communicate, and build. It is impossible to ignore: AI now answers our questions, helps us make decisions, assists us in coding, organizes our lives, and guides us through complex topics that used to require months, even years of experience to crack.

    Over the past two+ years, I have used AI every single hour ‚Äî yes, literally every hour ‚Äî whether on my computer or my phone. It has become both a companion and an accelerator in my life. But more importantly, it has reshaped how I think and how I learn.

    This is my personal reflection on how AI has shaped me, and how I believe we should approach this new force that is transforming the world.

    How AI Shapes My daily life

    • Coding: As a software engineer, no doubt coding is my top usage scenario: from auto-completing as I type, generating code snippet as I prompted, to understand a large size codebase, refactoring/improving existing code, etc.
    • Learning: System design, best practices, quickly learning something I am not familiar (istio, Kafka, AWS EKS CNI, EAP protocol‚Ä¶); how to build up home servers, arrs, all linux related knowledge, I knew then I will know much deeper, or I don‚Äôt know then now I know.
    • Life questions: all sorts of random question: how and when to plant radish/pepperüòÄ, cooking tips, what is this (air switch on the wall, random electronics‚Ä¶) kinda questions.
    • Stock & investment decisions: yes, I asked AI to analyze a domain, an individual company, financial data like PEG, DCF evaluation, potential momentum and risk(s), etc (disclaimer: AI is not financial advice ‚Äî I always verify numbers independently)

    AI has truly boosted my learning, working productivity, I‚Äôd like to say: ‚Äúit installed multiple wings to our human beings, we can now fly in the knowledge sky!‚Äù

    My Attitude Toward AI

    AI essentially lowered the learning cost for everybody, the easy and fast access to knowledge/skills/experience is UNPRECEDENTED!

    Treat AI as your learning advisor and companion, using it wisely to dramatically improve learning efficiency!

    Never 100% trust AI, ask it to provide reliable proof, sometimes it will admit ‚ÄúI was wrong about XYZ‚Ä¶ blah blah‚Äù

    Different ways of using AI

    • AI as a teacher (explains concepts at any level)
    • AI as a pair-programmer (debugging, code review)
    • AI as a research assistant (summaries, comparisons)
    • AI as a brainstorm partner (ideas, creativity, writing)
    • AI as a life coach (habit prompts, rational thinking)

    When to trust AI

    • Rough drafts
    • Brainstorming
    • Learning summaries/TLDRs
    • Explaining difficult concepts
    • Code patterns

    When NOT to trust AI

    • Legal/financial/medical decisions
    • Unverified facts or citations
    • Anything involving risk, security, or critical systems
    • Sensitive personal opinions

    Future Outlook ‚Äî What‚Äôs Next?

    At the end of the day, AI didn‚Äôt replace me ‚Äî it amplified me. It made me learn faster, think deeper, and build more.

    I am NOT worried about massive jobs replacement by AI, nor worries about layingoffs; instead, I deeply believe in AI will end up create MUCH more jobs! Because of explosive new demands, domains as more needs will be generated!

    AI will NEVER replace humenbeings, however, people don‚Äôt accept and use/leverage AI could be replaced by the people do!
